text: Arsen Dedić (born 28 July 1938) was a Croatian singer-songwriter. He was known in the Croatian as well as former Yugoslav music scene. Dedić wrote and performed chansons as well as movie music. He was also an award-winning poet, and was one of the best-selling poets of former Yugoslavia. ==Other websites== * * * *Compositions by Arsen Dedić Category:1938 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Croatian musicians Category:Yugoslavian poets Category:Singer- songwriters Category:Croatian writers
title: Arsen Dedić
